title: Google Maps Scraper Input
description: Configuration for Google Maps scraping Actor (skeleton).

searchTerms.title: Search terms
searchTerms.description: List of free-text search terms, e.g. ['restaurants', 'dentist'].

categories.title: Categories
categories.description: Optional list of categories to combine with each search term, e.g. ['hotel', 'coffee shop'].

location.title: Location (text)
location.description: Free-text location such as 'Berlin, Germany'. Used when no customGeolocation is provided.

customGeolocation.title: Custom geolocation (GeoJSON)
customGeolocation.description: Optional GeoJSON geometry object describing search area. Supports Point (with optional radiusKm), Polygon, and MultiPolygon.

maxCrawledPlacesPerSearch.title: Max places per search
maxCrawledPlacesPerSearch.description: Maximum number of places to crawl for each search job.

language.title: Interface language
language.description: Interface language code for Google Maps UI (e.g. 'en', 'de', 'fr').

extractReviews.title: Extract reviews
extractReviews.description: Whether to enqueue review scraping for each place.

maxReviews.title: Maximum reviews per place
maxReviews.description: Maximum number of reviews to extract per place (0 means skip reviews).

extractImages.title: Extract images metadata
extractImages.description: Whether to extract image URLs and basic metadata for each place.

enrichContacts.title: Enrich company contacts
enrichContacts.description: If true, crawl business websites to extract emails, phones, and social links (billable per enrichment event).

enrichLeads.title: Enrich business leads
enrichLeads.description: If true, attempt to infer key leads (name, job title, LinkedIn profile, etc.) from business websites (billable per enrichment event).

enrichSocialProfiles.title: Social profile enrichment
enrichSocialProfiles.description: List of social networks to enrich for each place. Each value enables enrichment and billing for that network.

proxy.title: Proxy configuration
proxy.description: Proxy configuration. Use Apify Proxy (residential recommended) for reliable large-scale scraping.

apifyProxyGroups.title: Apify Proxy groups
apifyProxyGroups.description: Optional list of Apify Proxy groups. For example, ['RESIDENTIAL'] for residential proxies.

apifyProxyCountry.title: Apify Proxy country
apifyProxyCountry.description: Two-letter country code for Apify Proxy geolocation (e.g. 'US', 'DE').

proxyUrls.title: Custom proxy URLs
proxyUrls.description: Optional list of custom proxy URLs to be used instead of Apify Proxy.
